longReason: The user sent a message containing a censored slur (“gr@pist”) directed at an unspecified target, alongside a full mailing address—“Khi Williamson 33, Calder Grove, HU8 9NU”—and exact coordinates (53.77831° N, 0.27062° W). This communication constitutes a serious threat, as it furnishes both a location and language suggesting violent action. To protect the community from potential harm, the user was banned immediately.
